languages.text: Ужас заставил людей молчать — никто не хочет взойти на костер из-за длинного языка.
Horror has sealed the population's lips — no one wishes to be burned at the stake for their careless tongue.
languages.original_text: Ужас заставил людей молчать — никто не хочет взойти на костер из-за длинного языка.

traits.locale_text: Horror has sealed the population's lips — no one wishes to be burned at the stake for their careless tongue.
Horror has sealed the population's lips — nobody wishes to be burned at the stake because of a careless tongue.

Horror has sealed the population's lips — nobody wishes to be burned at the stake due to a careless tongue.
Horror has sealed the population's lips — no one wishes to be burned at the stake for their careless tongue.

languages.text: La terreur fait taire la population : personne n'a envie de brûler sur le bûcher pour ne pas avoir su tenir sa langue.
languages.original_text: Horror has sealed the population's lips — no one wishes to be burned at the stake for their careless tongue.

traits.locale_text: La terreur fait taire la population : personne n'a envie de brûler sur le bûcher pour ne pas avoir su tenir sa langue.

languages.text: 恐怖で人々は口を閉ざしたーー誰も不注意に口を滑らせて火あぶりになりたくはないのだ。
languages.original_text: Horror has sealed the population's lips — no one wishes to be burned at the stake for their careless tongue.

traits.locale_text: 恐怖で人々は口を閉ざしたーー誰も不注意に口を滑らせて火あぶりになりたくはないのだ。
恐怖で人々は口を閉ざしたーー誰も不注意に口を滑らせて火あぶりになりたくはないのだ。

languages.text: 恐惧堵住了人们的嘴巴，谁也不愿祸从口出，落得在火刑柱上被活活烧死的下场。
languages.original_text: Horror has sealed the population's lips — no one wishes to be burned at the stake for their careless tongue.

traits.locale_text: 恐惧堵住了人们的嘴巴，谁也不愿祸从口出，落得在火刑柱上被活活烧死的下场。
恐惧堵住了人们的嘴巴，谁也不愿祸从口出，死在火刑柱上。

languages.text: El horror ha sellado los labios de la población, ya que nadie quiere acabar en la hoguera por un desliz.
languages.original_text: Horror has sealed the population's lips — no one wishes to be burned at the stake for their careless tongue.

traits.locale_text: El horror ha sellado los labios de la población, ya que nadie quiere acabar en la hoguera por un desliz.

languages.text: Das Grauen hat die Lippen der Bevölkerung versiegelt — niemand möchte wegen einer zu lockeren Zunge am Pfahl verbrannt werden.
languages.original_text: Horror has sealed the population's lips — no one wishes to be burned at the stake for their careless tongue.

traits.locale_text: Das Grauen hat die Lippen der Bevölkerung versiegelt — niemand möchte wegen einer zu lockeren Zunge am Pfahl verbrannt werden.

languages.text: Halk, korkudan ağzını açamıyor. Kimse yanlış bir söz söyledi diye yanmak istemiyor.
languages.original_text: Horror has sealed the population's lips — no one wishes to be burned at the stake for their careless tongue.
